 2007-12302007-08-01TC,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Post Corporation Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment of ROBERT B. PLETCH, Q.C. of Regina, Saskatchewan, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Canada Post Corporation, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, in the place of Gavin Semple, effective August 23, 2007.
